√ru1 'cry'

present: [2.] rauti  ravīti  ruvanti etc. B.+  rūyāt  ravāṇa?   -- [6.] ruváti etc. V.+   -- [1.] ravati  ravate etc. JB.+  

perfect: rurāva  ruruvire  

aorist: [1.] rūyāt   -- [3.] arūruvat  arīravat   -- [5.] árāvīt etc.  

[future: raviṣyati  ravitā  rotā  ]

verbal: rutá AV.+  rotum  

secondary: intensive: róravīti etc. V.+  róruvāṇa  rorūyate etc. E.+  rorūyati   -- desiderative: rurūṣa-   -- causative: rāvayati etc. S.+  

derivatives: ráva V.+  ravaṇa C.  ruvaṇa- RV.  -rávas V.+  ravitṛ B.  ṛavátha V.B.S.  ruvátha B.  rúma? RV.  rāva E.+  rāvin E.+  rāvaṇa E.+  rā́van B.
